pullrequest.title: Add light as child of link

content.raw:
I also tried removing the pendulum from the world and then deleting the sphere light - Gazebo still crashes. Backtrace:

~~~
#0  0x00007ffff6ae9428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
#1  0x00007ffff6aeb02a in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff6ae1bd7 in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff62aadf5 "px != 0", 
    file=file@entry=0x7ffff62aaf58 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", line=line@entry=648, 
    function=function@entry=0x7ffff62e1880 <_ZZNK5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo7physics5WorldEEptEvE19__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::World; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::World*"...) at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff6ae1c82 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff62aadf5 "px != 0", 
    file=file@entry=0x7ffff62aaf58 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", line=line@entry=648, 
    function=function@entry=0x7ffff62e1880 <_ZZNK5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo7physics5WorldEEptEvE19__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::World; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::World*"...) at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff620b39d in boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::World>::operator-> (this=0x1b36f70)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:648
#5  gazebo::physics::Light::PublishPose (this=0x1b36f20) at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/Light.cc:93
#6  0x00007ffff61de80e in gazebo::physics::Entity::SetWorldPoseDefault (this=this@entry=0x18648e0, _pose=..., _notify=_notify@entry=false)
    at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc:452
#7  0x00007ffff61de9b2 in gazebo::physics::Entity::SetWorldPoseCanonicalLink (this=0x18648e0, _pose=..., _notify=false, _publish=true)
    at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc:391
#8  0x00007ffff61dc78f in gazebo::physics::Entity::SetWorldPose (this=0x18648e0, _pose=..., _notify=_notify@entry=false, 
    _publish=_publish@entry=true) at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc:493
#9  0x00007ffff627e05c in gazebo::physics::World::Update (this=this@entry=0xfdbcd0)
    at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/World.cc:782
#10 0x00007ffff628d83a in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=this@entry=0xfdbcd0)
    at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/World.cc:659
#11 0x00007ffff628de75 in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (this=0xfdbcd0) at /media/louise/TERA/code/gazebo7/gazebo/physics/World.cc:468
#12 0x00007ffff34d35d5 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.58.0
#13 0x00007ffff65b16ba in start_thread (arg=0x7fff777fc700) at pthread_create.c:333
#14 0x00007ffff6bbb3dd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:109
~~~

I also tried removing the pendulum from the world and then deleting the sphere light - Gazebo still crashes. Backtrace:
